step.para: Check the SmartProxy where you want to install the software.
From Version to Install, select the version of the SmartProxy to install.

If you have already entered credentials for this host, the Credentials area should already be entered. Otherwise, on the Credentials, Default tab type a user name with elevated security credentials and the users password. If you are using domain credentials, the format for User ID must be in the format of <domainname>\<username>. On ESX hosts, if SSH login is disabled for the Default user, type in a user with remote login access on the Remote Login tab.
Click Validate to verify the credentials.
